query:
UPDATE attendance_sessions
            SET
              check_in_at = $2,
              check_out_at = $3,
              status = CASE WHEN $3::timestamptz IS NULL THEN 'OPEN' ELSE 'CLOSED' END,
              is_manual = TRUE,
              manual_note = $4,
              manual_updated_by = $5,
              manual_updated_at = NOW(),
              updated_at = NOW()
            WHERE id = $1
